php.LBL_YETIFORCE_WATCHDOG_DESC: Page de configuration du service de surveillance de surveillance YetiForce
php.LBL_YETIFORCE_WATCHDOG_FULL_DESC: The watchdog mechanism monitors the CRM system work and transfers selected information to YetiForce S.A. All collected information will not be published and is intended only to monitor the CRM system for incorrect operation and the environment on which it is installed.
php.LBL_SPACEBACKUP: Espace de stockage du répertoire de sauvegarde
php.LBL_STABILITY: Configuration de la stabilité du système
php.LBL_WRITABLEFILESANDFOLDERS: Fichiers et dossiers accessibles en écriture
